MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH13 postcode area of Edinburgh. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have restored power to a number of properties and located a fault on our overhead line network near West Mill Road and we now expect your supply to be restored by 5pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:26pm on the 28th of April 2021
